      • conductTranslation

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> conductTranslation(java.lang.String vendor,
                                                                       java.lang.String mapping_file,
                                                                       java.lang.String edf_dir,
                                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selected_Edf_files,
                                                                       java.lang.String annotation_dir,
                                                                       java.lang.String stage_dir,
                                                                       java.lang.String output_dir,
                                                                       java.lang.String outname)
        Conducts translation from different vendor and log the result
        Parameters:
        vendor - vender name
        mapping_file - vender-specific mapping file
        edf_dir - directory of containing edf file
        selected_Edf_files - array of selected edf files
        annotation_dir - directory containing the annotation
        stage_dir - directory containing the stage file
        output_dir - output directory
        outname - output name before translation
        Returns:
        array of translated files

        message - the message to be logged

      • updateOutputPattern

        public static java.lang.String updateOutputPattern(java.lang.String pattern,
                                                   java.lang.String key,
                                                   java.awt.event.ItemEvent e)
        Updates patterns corresponding to CheckBox event
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern to be updated
        key - section of the new pattern related to different event
        e - the event generated by selecting or deselecting CheckBox items
        Returns:
        the updated pattern
